extension.description: Seriál "Simonova kočka" vykresluje a zveličuje legrační vztah mezi mužem a jeho kočkou. Vytvořeno: Simon Tofield

Simon's Cat is an animated cartoon and book series by the British animator Simon Tofield featuring a hungry cat who uses increasingly heavy-handed tactics to get his owner to feed him. Created by Simon Tofield
